content:
When building a new profile, I am unsure what to put in the IG column of the profile page in the base resource that this profile is made from. When I put anything but "core" I get the following error:
"java.lang.Exception: Error Parsing Resource condition: IG Name 'xyz' is not registered in [igs] in fhir.ini at condition-spreadsheet.xml, sheet "Profiles", row 3"
What should I be putting this as? Or how do I register a new IG?

Is this a question about the FHIR specification build? If so the committers stream is a better place for questions like these. As far as the igs go they are no longer published as part of the core specification so your only choice is core. ( there is no [igs] in fhir.ini anymore.)
Thanks for the response. I have joined the committers stream and will post any follow up questions there. However you answered my query about the lack of [igs] in fhir.ini
